content.rendered:
[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” el_class=”innerpage-banner”][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row disable_element=”yes” el_class=”about-section”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text el_class=”about-bg”]

About Us

[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading text=”At CONC@T, our business is helping your business succeed. Conc@tors collaborate with both the service seekers and the service providers by providing a powerful support system.” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_video link=”https://www.youtube.com/embed/1HUOgwd5has” el_class=”videomodalcontainer”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]Conc@t is a B2B marketplace intending to help business startups, MSMEs to large corporates on critical aspects of the business. Conc@t is founded by the 3’Cs concept, namely capability, consistency, and cultivation, and the approach revolves around the concept of shared value to the company, the environment, and the community.

Conc@tors blend their intrinsic value of global expertise in business with a strong ethical foundation and fairness in operation in a fast-evolving marketplace and uncertainties.

We are a one-stop platform for all business-critical areas encompassing consulting and/ or business process outsourcing backed by subject matter experts across functions like Information Technology, Finance, Legal & Secretarial, HR & Training, Sales & Distribution, Marketing & Customer success. Conc@tors also acts as a catalyst for change and not only help build your strategy but are hands-on in implementing it through our collaborations.

Wide range of service providers to address all your business needs
Best commercials across service range fitting your budget
Algorithm-based best three service provider allocation considering various parameters
Assignment of experienced consultants who are technical subject matter experts for project governance
Professionally qualified lead generation platform
Conc@t assurance on service delivery/ payment milestones
Three-way rating mechanism to ensure transparency

Sign Up Now for Best Results [/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1603280688071{margin-top: 40px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1603280817641{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}” el_class=”locationImgPhrase”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1629115311902{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}” el_class=”colMainX”]

Locations

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”7/12″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1629115260847{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

Worldwide Locations

[/vc_column_text][vc_single_image image=”1263″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”5/12″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1629115271554{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

Our Locations in India

[/vc_column_text][vc_single_image image=”1264″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” el_class=”our-team” css=”.vc_custom_1603285602176{margin-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1603205323653{padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

Management Team

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner el_class=”box” css=”.vc_custom_1603209168991{margin-bottom: 60px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”631″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][vc_column_text el_class=”detail”]

Amit Bhargava Founder Director

Amit has over 25 years in the HR, Admin/Infra and training domains. He has worked across talent management, succession planning, strategic HRM and L&D with conglomerates like Shriram Group & Bharti Airtel besides working with IT Co’s like SUVI-Diaspark-Webdunia & APTECH.
Amit is a science graduate with a Master’s in Human Resource Management along with DHRM from NMIMS, Mumbai.[/vc_column_text][vc_icon icon_fontawesome=”fab fa-linkedin-in” color=”white” background_style=”rounded” background_color=”custom” size=”xs” align=”center” custom_background_color=”#b00005″ link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fwww.linkedin.com%2Fin%2Famit-bhargava-36744240||target:%20_blank|”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”632″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][vc_column_text el_class=”detail”]

Shorabhh Aggarwal Co-Founder Director

Shorabhh has over 22 years of diversified global experience in Consulting, Business Control, S&D, Marketing, Customer Experience and GTM strategy with abilities in managing ops at Corporate and Operational level. He has worked with Industry leaders like MTNL, Airtel, Reliance Communications and ANB.
A CA, CS & MBA Mktg & Finance, he is an avid traveller and cricket enthusiast.[/vc_column_text][vc_icon icon_fontawesome=”fab fa-linkedin-in” color=”white” background_style=”rounded” background_color=”custom” size=”xs” align=”center” custom_background_color=”#b00005″ link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fwww.linkedin.com%2Fin%2Fshorabhh-aggarwal-20422a122||target:%20_blank|”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”1397″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][vc_column_text el_class=”detail”]

Avinash Bansal Group Customer Success Officer

Avinash has 25 years of rich experience in B2C and B2B Customer Services having specialization in Enterprise Clients Mgt, Revenue Assurance, Call Centre Management, Collections & Risk Management at operations and corporate levels. He has worked with organizations like Bharti Airtel, RCOM and Escotel Mobile.
Avinash is a MBA in Sales & Mktg, and Master Diploma in Software Engg.

[/vc_column_text][vc_icon icon_fontawesome=”fab fa-linkedin-in” color=”white” background_style=”rounded” background_color=”custom” size=”xs” align=”center” custom_background_color=”#b00005″ link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fwww.linkedin.com%2Fin%2Favinash-bansal-1635a824||target:%20_blank|”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner el_class=”box” css=”.vc_custom_1603209168991{margin-bottom: 60px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”1393″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][vc_column_text el_class=”detail”]

Milind Phatak Group Chief Finance Officer

Milind, a qualified CA, CMA and a Law Graduate, has more than 36 years of diversified finance and accounts experience in Pharma MNC, leading Indian Telco and an Indian chemical company.
He has multi-faceted experience in Strategic Planning, Finance & Accounts, Auditing, ERP Implementation, Budgeting, System Management, MIS Management, Team Management, Costing, and Business Process Re-engineering.[/vc_column_text][vc_icon icon_fontawesome=”fab fa-linkedin-in” color=”white” background_style=”rounded” background_color=”custom” size=”xs” align=”center” custom_background_color=”#b00005″ link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fwww.linkedin.com%2Fin%2Fmilind-phatak-082a3a40||target:%20_blank|”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”634″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][vc_column_text el_class=”detail”]

Biju Sumughan Group Chief Sales & Marketing Officer

A spirited professional with over 3 decades of global experience across industry segments. He has been helping businesses discover their edge and carve a niche in the marketplace. Whether you’re a seasoned veteran or new, Biju helps you succeed in your start-up, growth and re-structuring initiatives.
A Welingkar alumnus, he is an avid reader & a kick boxing enthusiast.[/vc_column_text][vc_icon icon_fontawesome=”fab fa-linkedin-in” color=”white” background_style=”rounded” background_color=”custom” size=”xs” align=”center” custom_background_color=”#b00005″ link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fwww.linkedin.com%2Fin%2Fsumughan||target:%20_blank|”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”1833″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][vc_column_text el_class=”detail”]

Suresh Menon Group Chief Legal, Secretarial & Govt. Alliances Officer

A Corporate Legal & Compliance Professional with over 3 decades of comprehensive experience across Healthcare, Agro-Chemicals, Retail, Heavy Engineering, Cement, Power, Product building and Real Estate/ Infrastructure.
A Company Secretary, LLB, PGD International Trade Laws, Certificate courses in Sports Law, Real Estate Laws, Anti-Corruption & Compliance, and IP Laws in Healthcare Industry, Suresh strongly believes in mental & physical fitness and plays badminton actively.[/vc_column_text][vc_icon icon_fontawesome=”fab fa-linkedin-in” color=”white” background_style=”rounded” background_color=”custom” size=”xs” align=”center” custom_background_color=”#b00005″ link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fwww.linkedin.com%2Fin%2Fsuresh-menon-8003a4a||target:%20_blank|”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner el_class=”box” css=”.vc_custom_1603209168991{margin-bottom: 60px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”2350″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][vc_column_text el_class=”detail”]

Kapil Kumar Chawla Group Chief Insurance & Investment Officer

Kapil is an Insurance and Investment Professional with 15 plus years of domain expertise across sales & distribution, strategy, and product management. He has first-hand experience from on-field sales to handling nationwide distribution. Kapil has served in ICICI Prudential, Max Life Insurance, SBI Life Insurance, Shriram Group, and Insurtech startup bimakaro.in.
He is a commerce graduate and has done his MBA from Kurukshetra University. Kapil is an avid trainer and cricket enthusiast.[/vc_column_text][vc_icon icon_fontawesome=”fab fa-linkedin-in” color=”white” background_style=”rounded” background_color=”custom” size=”xs” align=”center” custom_background_color=”#b00005″ link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fwww.linkedin.com%2Fin%2Fkapil-kumar-chawla-82286828%2F||target:%20_blank|”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”2571″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][vc_column_text el_class=”detail”]

Shammi Pant Chief Content and Academic Officer

Shammi has over 25 years of work experience spanning Sales, Marketing, Business Development & Artificial Intelligence led Digitization, and Transformation Six Sigma roles. She has worked across Technology, Infrastructure Sectors & Offshoring Services.
As an engineer and MBA, she has worked with large fortune 500 companies like GE, Bank of America, Accenture, and HCL Technologies. Her experience ranges from leading end-to-end digitization and transformation solutions for business processes.[/vc_column_text][vc_icon icon_fontawesome=”fab fa-linkedin-in” color=”white” background_style=”rounded” background_color=”custom” size=”xs” align=”center” custom_background_color=”#b00005″ link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fwww.linkedin.com%2Fin%2Fshammi-pant-511581%2F||target:%20_blank|”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”3796″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][vc_column_text el_class=”detail”]

Rohit Chopra Chief Technology Officer

Rohit is an Information Technology Leader and an Entrepreneur with over 30 years of rich and diverse experience and interest in Education and Agriculture. He has worked for 20 years in the then fortune 200 companies on a spectrum of aspects like Service Delivery in Enterprise/ Government, Sales on a local/ Global basis for Manufacturing, Telecom, and Consumer/ Retail industry verticals with some of the best business conglomerates globally – CSC/DXC, Motorola, Unicorp to name a few.[/vc_column_text][vc_icon icon_fontawesome=”fab fa-linkedin-in” color=”white” background_style=”rounded” background_color=”custom” size=”xs” align=”center” custom_background_color=”#b00005″ link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fwww.linkedin.com%2Fin%2Frohit-chopra-9b75028%2F||target:%20_blank|”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]
